description: The royal palace of Alabasta located in the capital city of Alubarna. Home to the Nefertari royal family and seat of government for the kingdom.

keyEvents.title: Tsumegeri Guards' Sacrifice
keyEvents.description: The Tsumegeri Guards drink Hero Water and attack Crocodile at the palace to protect King Cobra.

keyEvents.title: Death of the Guards
keyEvents.description: The four Tsumegeri Guards die at the palace from Hero Water's effects.

keyEvents.title: Chaka's Transformation
keyEvents.description: Chaka transforms into his jackal form and attacks Crocodile at the palace.

keyEvents.title: Chaka Defeated
keyEvents.description: Crocodile defeats Chaka on the palace grounds.

keyEvents.title: Truth Revealed to Koza
keyEvents.description: Koza arrives at the palace and learns from Vivi that Crocodile is behind everything.

keyEvents.title: Pandaman Cameo
keyEvents.description: Pandaman appears among the palace guards.

culturalSignificance: Designed with heavy Egyptian architectural influences, reflecting Alabasta's inspiration from ancient Egypt. The palace represents the Nefertari dynasty's 800-year rule over the kingdom.

description: The large public square in front of Alubarna Palace. During the civil war, it becomes the main battlefield where the rebel and royal armies clash. Crocodile plans to detonate a massive bomb here to kill everyone.

keyEvents.title: White Flags Raised
keyEvents.description: Koza and the royal army raise white flags in the palace square to surrender to the rebels.

keyEvents.title: Koza Shot in the Square
keyEvents.description: Koza is shot by Baroque Works agents in the palace square while proclaiming peace.

keyEvents.title: Bomb Timer Countdown
keyEvents.description: The episode reveals the bomb planted in the square has 25 minutes until detonation.

culturalSignificance: The central battlefield of the Alabasta civil war, representing the conflict between the rebel and royal forces.

description: A tall clock tower in Alubarna where Crocodile has hidden a massive bomb with a five-kilometer blast radius. The bomb is guarded by Baroque Works agents Mr. 7 and Miss Father's Day and equipped with a timer as backup.

keyEvents.title: Bomb Location Revealed
keyEvents.description: The clock tower is revealed as the location of Crocodile's bomb, with 25 minutes remaining on the timer.

culturalSignificance: The clock tower serves as both a literal and symbolic countdown to Alabasta's potential destruction.

description: The capital city of Alabasta Kingdom, featuring Egyptian-inspired architecture with a massive palace at its center. The city becomes the main battlefield of the civil war's climax.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Regroup
keyEvents.description: Sanji, Usopp, and Chopper regroup in Alubarna after their battles.

culturalSignificance: Capital and cultural center of the Alabasta Kingdom, inspired by ancient Egyptian cities.
